text: This is the list of Grand Viziers of the Ottoman Empire. Ottoman Grand Viziers Grand viziers {| border="0" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="3" Grand Vizier Entered office Left office Background notes Alaeddin Pasha 1320 1331 Turkish Ottoman Nizamüddin Ahmed Pasha 1331 1348 Turkish Ottoman Hacı Pasha 1348 1349 Turkish Ottoman Sinanüddin Fakih Yusuf Pasha 1349 1364 Turkish Ottoman Çandarlı Kara Halil Hayreddin Pasha 1364 22 January 1387 Turkish Ottoman, from Cendere (or Çandar) village near Ankara, see Çandarlı family. Pasha was the first vizier to hold the title "Grand Vizier" and also the first with a military background. Çandarlı Ali Pasha 1387 1406 Turkish Ottoman (Çandarlı family) İmamzade Halil Pasha 1406 1413 Turkish Ottoman, from Osmancık Beyazıd Pasha 1413 1421 Turkish Ottoman, from Amasya Çandarlı (1st) İbrahim Pasha 1421 1439 Turkish Ottoman (Çandarlı family) Koca Mehmed Nizamüddin Pasha 1429 1439 Turkish Ottoman, from Osmancık or Amasya Çandarlı (2nd) Halil Pasha 1439 1 June 1453 Turkish Ottoman (Çandarlı family), first Grand Vizier who was executed. Veli Mahmud Pasha (1st time) 1453 1466 Greek Ottoman Rum Mehmed Pasha 1466 1469 Greek Ottoman, (Rum = Greek) İshak Pasha (1st time) 1469 1472 precise origin unknown, of Slavic background Veli Mahmud Pasha (2nd time) 1472 1474 Greek Ottoman Gedik Ahmed Pasha 1474 1477 discutably Albanian Ottoman (based on very loose evidence) Karamanlı Mehmed Pasha 1477 1481 Turkish Ottoman, from Karaman İshak title: List of Ottoman Grand Viziers
